card.name: 卍 De Szark 卍
card.text: ■ Gate of Moonless Night ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ If there are 4 or more cards under this creature, your opponent's creatures are put tapped.

card.name: Dupoiz, Darma
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, destroy 2 of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

card.name: Vogaiga, Darma
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then choose a darkness card from your graveyard and put it into your hand. ■ Your Magic Tool creatures cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Grigyan, Darma
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: Rabiripit, Remembrance Doll
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, discard one of your opponent's cards at random. ■ During your turn, whenever you summon a creature that costs 8 or more or cast a spell that costs 8 or more, your opponent discards their hand.

card.name: Bangetsu 卍 Ga Ryuzark 卍/Bangokusatsu
card.text: ■ Gate of Moonless Night Zetsu: At the End Step ■ At the start of your opponent's turn, they can't untap more than 3 cards in their mana zone. ■ Double Breaker ========================= ■ Destroy all creatures. ■ If the total number of cards in each player's graveyards are 13 or more, and this spell is in your shields, it has "shield trigger".

card.name: Baredu, Daspell
card.text: ■ Draw 2 cards, then discard a card from your hand.

card.name: Kajigri, Daspell
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Airvo, Daspell
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose a card that costs 7 or less in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Perfect Darkness
card.text: ■ You may cast this spell from your graveyard, If you do, after casting, put it on the bottom of your deck instead. ■ Choose 2 of the following. ''(You may choose the same one twice.)'' :► Your opponent chooses a card in their hand and discards it. :► Put a darkness creature that costs 4 or less or darkness aura that costs 4 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. :► Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -4000 power until the End Step

card.name: Gar Raganzark
card.text: ■ Fantasy Gate of Moonless Night: When you summon a Magic Tool creature or cast a Magic Tool spell, you may choose a total of 4 Magic Tools from the battle zone and/or graveyard and summon this creature from your hand or graveyard onto those 4 cards for no cost. ■ Blocker ■ Double Breaker ■ Your opponent can't choose this creature with spells. ■ During your opponent's turn, if your opponent would put a creature in any way except by summoning, your opponent puts that creature into their graveyard instead.
